name: final-project
description: ## Overview The outbreak of COVID-19 has proven to be a stressful and anxiety-provoking time for many people. Seeing as the entire world is currently undergoing quarantine conditions, we were inspired to create a tool that would help the community adapt to these social changes by creating a routine. We envisioned a platform that would encourage everyone to 1) help themselves through developing healthy & enjoyable habits 2) help others by contributing to those businesses/hospitals/vulnerable populations in need.
author: Zhen Qi
